tool.name: IDRTCalibration
tool.description: Can be used to calibrate RTs of peptide hits linearly to standards.
tool.command:
IDRTCalibration
#if $param_in: -in $param_in #end if #if $param_out: -out $param_out #end if #if $param_calibrant_1_reference: -calibrant_1_reference $param_calibrant_1_reference #end if #if $param_calibrant_2_reference: -calibrant_2_reference $param_calibrant_2_reference #end if #if $param_calibrant_1_input: -calibrant_1_input $param_calibrant_1_input #end if #if $param_calibrant_2_input: -calibrant_2_input $param_calibrant_2_input #end if #if $param_threads: -threads $param_threads #end if #if $adv_opts.adv_opts_selector=='advanced': #if $adv_opts.param_version: -version "$adv_opts.param_version" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_log: -log "$adv_opts.param_log" #end if #if $adv_opts.param_debug: -debug $adv_opts.param_debug #end if #if $adv_opts.param_no_progress: -no_progress #end if #if $adv_opts.param_force: -force #end if #if $adv_opts.param_test: -test #end if #end if

param.name: param_calibrant_1_reference
param.label: The RT of the first calibrant in the reference file

param.name: param_calibrant_2_reference
param.label: The RT of the second calibrant in the reference file

param.name: param_calibrant_1_input
param.label: The RT of the first calibrant in the input file
param.help: (-calibrant_1_input) Please note that this value needs to be set. The default value -1.0 is not allowed

param.name: param_calibrant_2_input
param.label: The RT of the second calibrant in the input file
param.help: (-calibrant_2_input) Please note that this value needs to be set. The default value -1.0 is not allowed

param.name: param_threads
param.label: Sets the number of threads allowed to be used by the TOPP tool

param.name: param_version
param.label: Version of the tool that generated this parameters file

param.name: param_log
param.label: Name of log file (created only when specified)

param.name: param_no_progress
param.label: Disables progress logging to command line

param.name: param_test
param.label: Enables the test mode (needed for internal use only)

tool.help:
Can be used to calibrate RTs of peptide hits linearly to standards.
For more information, visit http://ftp.mi.fu-berlin.de/OpenMS/release-documentation/html/TOPP_IDRTCalibration.html
